name: Millet Rivals
description:
Play as Terri or Spinel in order to be the first cockatiel to eat the millet at the dining table! But be careful because the living room is haunted and ghost hands may prevent you from reaching your much desired goal!

You can choose 4 different camera modes: fixed camera, follow camera, adaptative camera or split screen.

Controls:

Terri (yellow crest): WASD keys

Spinel (grey crest): arrow keys

ESC to pause

Credits:

Original 2d art by Lyhdyr

Songs by Queen, midi version by Estouls Aruta
